summary: REQ-1 is a production promotion/publish task with post-publish verification of core routes. The diff shows documentation plus source-code changes (backend/main.mo and other frontend-related summaries), but does not provide evidence of an actual promotion of Draft Version 29 to production. The presence of code changes also appears to violate the stated constraint to not modify source code during publish unless blocking issues are found (no such blocking issue is evidenced).

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the currently deployed Draft Version 29 to the production environment, making it the active version served to end users.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains a checklist document for verification, but no deployment/promotion configuration or release/publish mechanism change is shown that would actually promote Draft Version 29 to production or make it the default version.

missing_requirements.requirement: Post-publish verification confirms the production app loads successfully and core routes render (Landing page, role selection, dashboards).
missing_requirements.reason: A checklist is added describing what to verify, but there is no evidence in the diff of executed verification results or any automation/test output confirming routes rendered successfully in production.

hallucinated_features.description: Source code changes during publish (backend changes) despite constraint to not modify source code unless a blocking production issue is discovered.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains publish to avoid source-code modifications; diff shows backend/main.mo modified, and no evidence is provided that a blocking production issue was discovered during verification.

hallucinated_features.description: Numerous new/changed frontend product behaviors and UI enhancements (role-based routing enforcement details, landing page redesign, booking form pricing/validation, Stripe setup modal, Tailwind theme extensions, favicon changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states no new product features; BuildRequest only asks to publish Draft Version 29 and verify core routes. The diff summary describes extensive feature/UI work unrelated to the publish requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Stripe configuration/setup workflow changes (admin Stripe secret key entry, allowed countries) included in described changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal explicitly prohibits changing Stripe configuration or secrets, yet the diff summary indicates an admin component for entering Stripe secret key/allowed countries and Stripe setup checks.
